name: 2359 (AmmaarahNM)
description:
2359 is a 2D prototype created in collaboration with Imaan Abusamra and Tenisha Moodley for a University submission in 2021. In this simulation-style prototype, you player as a student rushing to submit an online exam, when suddenly your computer is hacked.

Download the file, unzip and click on the .exe file to play the game
